title: Scilex Holding Company Enters into Non-Binding Term Sheets for the Purchase of all of the Scilex Common Shares, Preferred Shares, and Warrants Currently Owned by Sorrento Therapeutics, Inc. and is Declared the New Successful Bidder - Yahoo Finance
description: Scilex Holding Company Enters into Non-Binding Term Sheets for the Purchase of all of the Scilex Common Shares, Preferred Shares, and Warrants Currently Owned by Sorrento Therapeutics, Inc. and is Declared the New Successful Bidder  Yahoo Finance
